attributes.action: Every Child Deserves a Healthy Start – And the Skills to Stay Healthy.
attributes.additional_details:
Cooking is a vital life skill. It boosts confidence, encourages healthy choices, and supports learning in subjects like science and maths. It prepares children for adulthood in a practical, lasting way.
Let’s give every child the best start to their day — and the skills to look after their future.
Fuel their minds. Nourish their potential.
attributes.background:
A hungry child can’t focus on learning. Free breakfasts for all remove stigma, support families, and ensure no one is left out.

But feeding children isn’t enough — we must also teach them to feed themselves.

rejection.details:
The Government is rolling out free breakfast clubs in England:  https://www.gov.uk/government/news/first-schools-confirmed-for-landmark-free-breakfast-clubs

Cooking and nutrition are taught as part of the National Curriculum for Design and Technology: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/national-curriculum-in-england-design-and-technology-programmes-of-study/national-curriculum-in-england-design-and-technology-programmes-of-study
